GeneDef.label: fleshmass thinker
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh in their brains, capable of some limited thought and communication with the carrier. This allows them to process information from several points of view and conduct passive research.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Passively generates <color=#8a8ae6>research points</color>.
Each <color=#8a8ae6>colonist</color> over 1 reduces the effect.
<color=#ffec85>Ignores all quest, prisoner, mutant, duplicate and deathresting pawns.</color>

GeneDef.label: fleshmass armor
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh all over their skin which provides decent protection but damages clothing due to constant growths.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Damage to apparels: 40 hp/day
Damage is reduced in space.
<color=#ffec85>Ignores nudist clothing.</color>

GeneDef.label: deadlife builder
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh with nests of archites capable of performing some construction work and repairing buildings.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Occasionally <color=#8a8ae6>repairs or constructs</color> buildings.
Can only work on 3 <color=#8a8ae6>buildings</color> or <color=#8a8ae6>frames</color> at a time.
Each <color=#8a8ae6>colonist</color> over 1 reduces the effect.
<color=#ffec85>Construction or repair by this gene creates deadlife gas.</color>
<color=#ffec85>Does not haul resources and does not repair breakdowns.</color>

GeneDef.label: self-devour stomach
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites that can recycle organs and limbs to satisfy the carrier's hunger.

customEffectDescriptions.li: When <color=#8a8ae6>hunger</color> is low, <color=#8a8ae6>destroys</color> a random limb or organ and restores the <color=#8a8ae6>hunger</color> bar.
The amount of nutrition received depends on the amount of meat, the factor for raw nutrition and the maximum nutrtion of the pawn.
<color=#ffec85>Can kill the carrier.</color>

GeneDef.label: fleshmass regeneration
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh that regenerate wounds and restore lost limbs depending on the number of wounds and scars.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Basic healing: 4 hp/day. This value is divided by the <color=#8a8ae6>summary HP percentage</color>. And then multiplied by the number of <color=#8a8ae6>wounds</color>, <color=#8a8ae6>scars</color> and <color=#8a8ae6>lost limbs</color>.

GeneDef.label: flycatcher skin
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh covering the skin and capable of digesting anything that touches it, mainly small insects.

customEffectDescriptions.li: In warm biomes with high <color=#8a8ae6>plant density</color>, it <color=#8a8ae6>replenishes ~10% /day</color>, at non-extreme <color=#8a8ae6>temperatures</color>.
<color=#8a8ae6>Allows to switch the eating of worn apparels.</color>
Each apparel loses 20 HP /day, restoring 2% /day.
Does not work in space.

GeneDef.label: deadlife breath
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have corrupted archites. Their bodies are practically woven from them, their very presence in the region leads to the raising of the dead.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Passively creates <color=#8a8ae6>deadlife gas</color> and <color=#8a8ae6>shamblers</color> if there are <color=#8a8ae6>corpses</color> on the map.
If there are no <color=#8a8ae6>corpses</color>, the gene goes into a cooldown of 24 hours.
<color=#8a8ae6>Shamblers</color> only live for a few hours.
Slowly accumulates <color=#8a8ae6>death refusal</color> attempts.
Each <color=#8a8ae6>colonist</color> over 1 increases the cooldown and slows down the accumulation of <color=#8a8ae6>death refusal</color> attempts.
<color=#ffec85>Ignores all quest, prisoner, mutant, duplicate and deathresting pawns.</color>
